summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated July 25, 2019. It includes inmate count sheets, rosters, and official count slips, listing inmates present in various housing units. The most significant entry is the roster showing Jeffrey Epstein was housed in unit H01-001L under the 'ATTY' (attorney) assignment category.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine administrative count of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, documenting inmate locations and assignments.

locations.name: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York
locations.context: Federal detention facility in New York, NY where Jeffrey Epstein and other listed inmates were housed. The address is noted as New York, New York 10007.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on July 25, 2019, with registration number 76318-054.
Epstein's specific housing assignment was unit H01-001L, and he was categorized under the 'ATTY' (attorney) assignment group on the inmate roster.
The document is a routine administrative prison record showing inmate counts and rosters, providing a snapshot of the prison population on that date.
The forms indicate standard prison procedures, including out-counts verified by staff and an operations lieutenant, submitted 45 minutes prior to the affected count.
